Mar 29, 2021 — Manganese is an essential trace element that is naturally present in many foods and available as a dietary supplement.
Aug 31, 2018 — Manganese may be good for treating inflammatory disorders, regulating blood sugar, and decreasing risk for health conditions like stroke.

results.t: Manganese Information | Mount Sinai - New York
results.p: It is found mostly in bones, the liver, kidneys, and pancreas. Manganese helps the body form connective tissue, bones, blood clotting factors, and sex hormones.

results.t: MANGANESE - Uses, Side Effects, and More
results.p: Manganese is an essential mineral required for the body to function properly. It's found in foods such as nuts, whole grains, and leafy green vegetables.
Manganese is a chemical element with symbol Mn and atomic number 25. Classified as a transition metal, Manganese is a solid at room temperature.

results.t: Manganese: Health benefits and side effects
results.p: Jul 2, 2019 — Health benefits of manganese can include providing antioxidants, supporting bone health, reducing blood sugar, and more.
